item.title: Realtime memory knowledge updates (RAG updates)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement real-time updates to the memory knowledge base of an AI system: Develop a system for continuous learning and updating of the AI’s knowledge base. Ensure the updates occur in real-time without impacting the AI’s performance. Test and validate the accuracy and relevance of the updated knowledge.
